version_description:
-------------------------------
+ Fixed bugs
+ Performance optimization

-------------------------------
+ Supported combining more videos together
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Supported adding text
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Enhancements of adding audio
- Support selecting the music from local music library
- Support adding multiple audios
- Support trimming, adjusting the volume, coping, deleting
+ Performance optimization

-------------------------------
+ Add function of Compressing video
+ Enhancements of bluring video
- add more shapes
- add more kinds of bluring
- Support invert bluring
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Add function of converting the video into GIF
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Add function of creating a picture-in-picture video
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Function of adding borders to video
+ Function of reordering the tools
+ More sound effects
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Function of adding stickers to video
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Enhanced video splicing: 100+ transition animation effects
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Add function of collage of videos with rich background texture images
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Add the function of dynamic motion blur:
select the shape and type, adjust the blur intensity and speed of moving, drag the handler and move to blur the selected part of the video.
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Add the function of dynamic motion blur:
select the shape and type, adjust the blur intensity and speed of moving, drag the handler and move to blur the selected part of the video.
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Support for 3D rotating video at any angle
+ Enhanced video dubbing
+ Added more sound material
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com

Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Added the function of painting on the video
+ Enhanced Adding sound effects to video: support for extracting audio from video
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com

Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Add BlingBling for the videos, make videos full of brilliance in the festival: automatically detect highlights in the video, add spots and star streaks and flexibly adjust their quantity, rotating speed and strength
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com

Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Add particle effects for the videos: over 100 particle effects templates and rich particle texture images,
flexible adjustment of various parameters of particle emission. Use your imagination to add surprises to your videos.
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed a bug: sometimes black screen after rendering the video
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com

Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Add particle effects for the videos: over 100 particle effects templates and rich particle texture images,
flexible adjustment of various parameters of particle emission. Use your imagination to add surprises to your videos.
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com

Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Added the feature of replaying a selected segment of the video
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com

Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Added feature to add a magnifying glass to your video
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Added feature to distort the video: provide a variety of distortion types and flexibility adjust twist radius, force and center position
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Added feature to reflect the video: provide a variety of reflection filters and flexibility adjust the boundary and position of reflection
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed several bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Added the feature of blending videos: provide 20+ classic blend modes: darken, multiply, color burn, linear burn, lighten, color dodge, linear dodge, overlay, soft light, hard light, average, difference, exclusion and so on; flexibility adjust the opacity, size and position of the foreground; exchange the foreground and the background; make the blended area into a variety of shapes
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ Added the feature of blending videos: provide 20+ classic blend modes: darken, multiply, color burn, linear burn, lighten, color dodge, linear dodge, overlay, soft light, hard light, average, difference, exclusion and so on; flexibility adjust the opacity, size and position of the foreground; exchange the foreground and the background; make the blended area into a variety of shapes
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ New feature: ERASE a fixed area (eg. the watermark) of the video, you can flexibly select the erased area by drawing directly on the video to erase the content on the fixed area, and the effect is better for the erased area with simple background color
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ New feature: CHROMAKEY by which a block of a particular color (often blue or green) in a video image can be replaced by another color; tap the video image or the color-bar to select the replaced color; provide rich target color scheme: pure color, gradient color, texture image, photo or video; flexibly adjust the threshold sensitivity controls how similar pixels need to be colored to be replaced and the degree of smoothing controls how gradually similar colors are replaced in the image
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ New feature: TUNER by which to adjust the pitch and volume of the sound within the video, distort the sound, and add reverb to the sound make the sound have some special effects
+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

+ Performance optimization
+ Fixed bugs

-------------------------------
+ Some optimizations and improvements
+ Fix minor bugs
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:

Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ New feature: Sticker+ by which to add dynamic stickers into the video and can adjust the size, position, duration, speed and color
+ Some optimizations and improvements
+ Some bug fixes
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ New feature: Sticker+ by which to add dynamic stickers into the video and can adjust the size, position, duration, speed and color;
you can select a GIF from your Albums as a dynamic sticker to add onto the video
+ Making an option of choosing an album when choosing a video
+ Some other optimizations and improvements
+ Some bug fixes
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ New feature: Sticker+ by which to add dynamic stickers into the video and can adjust the size, position, duration, speed and color;
you can select a GIF from your Albums as a dynamic sticker to add into the video
+ Flipping the Stickers
+ Inverting the mosaic area with Pixelate+
+ Some other optimizations and improvements
+ Some bug fixes
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

-------------------------------
+ New feature: Info by which to view, modify or delete some EXIF and properties of the video file,
such as the name, size, resolution, fps, bps, duration, codec and some other exif such as GPS, title, keywords, creationDate and so on
+ Some other optimizations and improvements
+ Some bug fixes
-------------------------------
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact at:
mekits@163.com
Thanks for using Videdit.

+ Added the adjustment of the opacity of the sticker
+ Some other optimizations and improvements
+ Some bug fixes
